description: A dense, mysterious forest within Upper Yard where Priest Satori conducts the Ordeal of Balls. The forest is filled with Surprise Clouds and serves as a dangerous maze for anyone attempting to pass through.

keyEvents.title: Battle Against Satori Continues
keyEvents.description: Luffy, Sanji, and Usopp continue their desperate struggle against Satori in the depths of the Lost Forest.
keyEvents.significance: Primary battleground for the Ordeal of Balls confrontation.

keyEvents.title: Mantra Demonstration
keyEvents.description: Satori demonstrates complete mastery of Mantra in the Lost Forest, predicting all attacks.
keyEvents.significance: Shows why the Lost Forest with Satori is so deadly - his Mantra makes escape nearly impossible.

keyEvents.title: Surprise Clouds Explained
keyEvents.description: The Surprise Clouds floating throughout the Lost Forest are shown containing various unpredictable contents.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the unique dangers of this location within Upper Yard.

name.japanese: ゴーイング・メリー号

description: The Straw Hat Pirates' first ship, currently anchored in the White Sea near Upper Yard. In this episode, Chopper is left alone to guard the ship.

keyEvents.title: Chopper Returns to Ship
keyEvents.description: After encountering a sky shark, Chopper is thrown back to the Going Merry where he's alone.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up Chopper's isolation and vulnerability when Shura arrives.

keyEvents.title: Finding the Whistle
keyEvents.description: Chopper finds Gan Fall's whistle on the Going Merry.
keyEvents.significance: The ship serves as the location where Chopper finds his means of calling for help.

keyEvents.title: Shura Arrives
keyEvents.description: Priest Shura arrives at the Going Merry on his bird Fuza to confront Chopper.
keyEvents.significance: The ship becomes the setting for the upcoming battle between Chopper, Gan Fall, and Shura.

description: The sacred land of Skypiea, originally part of Jaya that was knocked into the sky 400 years ago. Home to Enel's God's Army and the site of various deadly ordeals.

keyEvents.title: Aisa Gathering Soil
keyEvents.description: Aisa is shown gathering soil in Upper Yard, marking her debut in the series.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the civilian life of Shandia people within Upper Yard.

description: The sea of clouds at 7,000 meters above the Blue Sea where Skypiea is located. Home to various sky creatures including sky sharks.

keyEvents.title: Sky Shark Encounter
keyEvents.description: Chopper encounters a dangerous sky shark in the White Sea while searching for a hammer.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the dangerous wildlife inhabiting the White Sea around Upper Yard.
